select n.nbidx ,n.title ,n.content ,DATE_FORMAT(n.wdate,'%Y-%m-%d') as wdate ,n.cnt ,u.email ,u.name FROM notice n , usertable u WHERE n.midx = u.midx AND n.delyn = 'N'
AND n.title like concat('%',#{searchValue},'%')
AND n.content like concat('%',#{searchValue},'%')
ORDER BY nbidx desc
LIMIT #{page}, #{perPageNum}

SELECT count(n.nbidx) FROM notice n , usertable u WHERE n.midx = u.midx AND n.delyn = 'N'
AND n.title like concat('%',#{searchValue},'%')
AND n.content like concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') OR u.name like concat('%',#{searchType},'%')
SELECT n.nbidx ,n.title ,n.content ,n.wdate ,n.filename ,n.midx ,n.cnt ,u.email ,u.name ,u.midx FROM notice n , usertable u WHERE n.midx = u.midx AND n.nbidx = #{nbidx}
SELECT n.nbidx ,n.title ,n.content ,n.wdate ,n.filename ,n.midx ,n.cnt FROM notice n WHERE delyn = 'N' ORDER BY wdate desc LIMIT 0,1
